messageBody:
RE: [junit] junit, reporting and httpunit

i tried this with no luck...
i'm attaching my build.xml -
where would i put the report stuff?

if this looks like a billable task, please don't (do anything (OR bill me :-) )

thanks

-----Original Message-----
From: Vladimir Bossicard [mailto:vladimir@bossicard.com]
Sent: Thursday, March 07, 2002 3:49 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] junit, reporting and httpunit


> How would i tweak it to add reporting?


you can:
- write your own TestResultListener
- write your own TestRunner (and modify the addError... methods)
- use the JUnitReport Ant task

http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/manual/OptionalTasks/junitreport.html

-Vladimir
